page.title: 06WHAT WE DO ON SATURDAYS
page.content: On Saturday mornings in the Summer I have been going to the tennis coaching in Ward Park in Bangor.This lasts for 6 weeks altogether.For the past two weeks we have been playing in a tournament.I am still in and I play my fourth round match next week.A lot of girls from Towerview School go to the tennis but only a few of us are still in the tournament. During the afternoons I don't really do anything.I used to play badminton at Ballyholme Methodist Church but that's over for the summer. My Dad usually goes to golf on Saturdays at Bangor Golf Club.My Mum goes shopping in Ballyholme in the morning and my brother is sometimes to be found out in the garage painting his models.
